name: No Looking Back
description:
From moving boxes to avoiding slimes, No Looking Back is a top-down dungeon exploring title, filled to the brim with challenging obstacles.

It is my first ever finished project as a game dev, I would love to get some feedback to keep on making it better over time. 

If you have already played it, thanks for playing! If not, get it now and enjoy exploring the levels it offers. Cheers!
